description: Alterations of fenestration to side and rear elevation at ground floor level, including replacement of existing double glazed, uPVC windows and doors with double glazed, timber-framed doors to rear elevation, and replacement of double glazed, uPVC doors with double glazed, timber-framed doors to side elevation
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be retained in accordance with drawing title number(s): DWG0157PL-001 Site Location Plan, DWG0157PL-100 Existing Ground Floor, DWG0157PL-101 Existing First Floor, DWG0157PL-102 Existing Second Floor, DWG0157PL-103 Existing Roof, DWG0157PL-200 Existing Front Elevation, DWG0157PL-201 Existing Left Elevation, DWG0157PL-202 Existing Rear Elevation, DWG0157PL-203 Existing Right Elevation, DWG0157PL-110 Rev B Proposed Ground Floor Plan, DWG0157PL-111 Rev B Proposed First Floor Plan, DWG0157PL-112 Rev B Proposed Second Floor Plan, DWG0157PL-113 Rev B Proposed Roof, DWG0157PL-210 Proposed Front Elevation, DWG0157PL-211 Proposed Left Elevation, DWG0157PL-212 Rev B Proposed Rear Elevation, DWG0157PL-213 Rev B Proposed Right Elevation.

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | The materials to be used for the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing, unless where stated on either the submitted application form or the drawings / plans as listed in Condition (2).

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with Policies 7.4 & 7.6 of the London Plan (2016) and Policies 7.4, 7.6 and 7B of Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013), polices 1.1 (k) and 1.2 (f) of the adopted Development (Core) Strategy (2012).
